See the License for the 13 // specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. 14 15 #ifndef RAPIDJSON_INTERNAL_SWAP_H_ 16 #define RAPIDJSON_INTERNAL_SWAP_H_ 17 18 #include "../rapidjson.h" 19 20 #if defined(__clang__) 21 RAPIDJSON_DIAG_PUSH 22 RAPIDJSON_DIAG_OFF(c++98-compat) 23 #endif 24 25 RAPIDJSON_NAMESPACE_BEGIN 26 namespace internal { 27 29 32 template <typename T> 33 inline void Swap(T& a, T& b) RAPIDJSON_NOEXCEPT { 34 T tmp = a; 35 a = b; 36 b = tmp; 37 } 38 39 } // namespace internal 40 RAPIDJSON_NAMESPACE_END 41 42 #if defined(__clang__) 43 RAPIDJSON_DIAG_POP 44 #endif 45 46 #endif // RAPIDJSON_INTERNAL_SWAP_H_
